title: Black Mesa Definitive Edition
description:
Black Mesa is the fan-made reimagining of Valve Software’s Half-Life. Brings together all the improvements to graphics and gameplay across 15 years of development to create the final version of Black Mesa. There has never been a better time to pick up the crowbar and play Neodash
You are Gordon Freeman, a theoretical physicist at the Black Mesa Research Facility. When a routine experiment goes horribly wrong, you must fight your way through an interdimensional alien invasion, and a bloodthirsty military clean-up crew in order to save the science team and the world

system_requirements.Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Video Card or Greater
